lines.text:
[after zapping Amanda's pants off]
Boy, I love a full moon, don't you?

[holding Amanda]
The least you can do is put on some underwear.

[to Wayne]
I don't have any. You ate them all!
And boy, were they good!
What brings you to the wiener business?
Well, I'd like to sell a product I'm familiar with, and I know my wiener.
Of all the high schools, of all the towns, and all the world... he walks into mine.
Hey why don't you go take long walk on sh-short... beach

[to Kevin ]
Hey whats happening?
Hey dude you're not happening. What happened to your legs man?
China bowl
I didn't know they bowled in China
AHHH! HA HA!
[both high five ]
Right on dude. Now how did ya really break'em?
At Vail man, we're going there next season
Dude I'm there, righteous man party till you drop
Cool dude
Later bag!
Wow she's pretty, ya think she'll go out with me?
Hey you moron thats Kevin.
...Ya think he'll go out with me?
